subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: PITTSBURGH, Jan 17 (AP) — Numerous visiting coaches have predicted that Pittsburgh could be a Final Four team, an understandable reaction given the Panthers’ No. 6 ranking and 12-0 record at home.
